thread.title: Friendly staff, small and handy
thread.title_full: Friendly staff, small and handy - Review of The Jewel facing Rockefeller Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DavidF2011
title: Friendly staff, small and handy
text: It's nothing fancy or amazing but does job in midtown, good location for business if your meetings etc in this part of city and I guess also for travellers/tourists who want easy access to mid town attractions. It's pretty basic in terms of room, small , but a nice touch is water on each level, gym is small but okay, and the club quarters terrace which you have access to is a nice spot for food and okay prices. Staff are friendly and available, a good choice for the budget as it's much cheaper than most options around here, so it represents good value.
